data.title: A Main Flank + Post Plant Setup
data.description: Use this setup to watch both side of the A Main Flank + set up a post plant setup from Short.

data.title: A Site Ultimate Ability Execute
data.description: Use your ultimate like this when you need / could benefit enough from making it easier for your team to plant the Spike and take strong post plant positions after your team has pushed out of Short into A Site.

data.title: B Long Flank + Post Plant
data.description: Use this setup to hold the B Flank and play post plant from B Long.

data.title: Full Utility A Main Hold
data.description: Use this to make it really difficult for Attackers to push through the A Main chokepoint.
